overview: If you like bad boys, this ass smashing, butt burglar, bang-a-thon will quench your thirst for thugged out, groin gagging gangstas! The well cocked crew of delicious dudes from the wrong side of the tracks live on the edge, breaking into houses, and ALWAYS busting through the back door! The tattooed thugs throw down jail house HARD! And, eventually their crazy life of crime gets them caught with their pants down, by the fiercely fuckable fuzz!
title: Breakin' In
